Le Hung

Fighter, Reader, Programmer and Gamer

Labelling: I hate when people label me for doing something that i did not cause.
 Basically, the Crowd is not "The Truth" or "Justice". That's why we need COURTS and JUDGES, and they have to be FREE from the CONTROL of every Government. I mean, what's the point of having a Judge when that Judge is gonna be the Government's henchman anyway? It's just purely stupid.
 People keep saying "Life is not fair". B.....S. Life is very Fair to y'all, it is YOU people that are being UNFAIR to each other for crying out loud.
 Honestly, i don't like The Crowd, or in fact, i don't even like people. They are like a bunch of noisy, lousy, clumsy monkeys that have no Control over their own Reactions. Unless, that Crowd is full of well-educated people, otherwise is gonna be exactly like Women, just talk and gossip about things and things that they themselves don't even understand.
